name: TAL: Arctic 3
description: TAL: Arctic 3 - In this game you need help an unknown creature to go in the magic portal across many mazes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
